markup.content: Thank you for participating in our resident survey.
In order to validate residentes. Please enter your personal code.

title.value: Help equalize opportunity in business and education.

markup.content: Here is what you can expect:

content.content: Only one survey can be submitted per household.
At this house, apartment, or mobile home - do you or any member of this household have access to the internet?
What's the reason for not having internet access?

items.name: internet-service-reason
items.labelText: No computer/electronic device to access the internet

content.content: How much are you paying for your current internet service?
Do you consider your internet service fast?
How do you feel about your service?
Have you had an outage since March 2020?
How long did the outage last (# of days)?

markup.content: Thank you for finishing this survey.
